duties.description: Developed and maintained user interface components and web pages based on design specifications.
Integrated third-party services and APIs, including Shopify Storefront API, Contentful, and internal systems.
Built reusable UI sections and implemented interactive features such as product calculators and search filters.
Added support for multiple currencies and alternative payment providers.
Refactored codebase and styles to improve structure, consistency, and performance using tools like Material UI..
Fixed bugs, optimized functionality, and ensured production readiness.
Worked closely with SEO and design teams to implement improvements in performance, content, and accessibility.
Maintained and updated the codebase, providing long-term support for live projects.
Led a full platform redesign, modernizing the user interface according to new design specifications and improving overall user experience.
Created reusable UI components consistent with the updated design system.
Developed advanced filtering and search functionality for improved service discoverability.
Refactored and enhanced the user communication system to increase reliability and usability.
Improved the scheduling and notification features, including calendar integration and alert logic.
Designed and implemented a global state management solution to handle shared data across components efficiently.
Collaborated closely with product, design, and QA teams to deliver high-quality, user-focused features.
